price: 52. Tie, kuriems Mes davėme Raštą [t. y. Tauratą (Torą) ir Indžylį (Evangeliją)] prieš tai, jie tiki jį (Koraną).
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ هُم بِهِۦ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alladhīna ātaynāhumu al-kitāba min qablihi hum bihi yu'minūna
